title: Beats by Dre x Cesc Fabregas: Hear What You Want Commercial
description:
Soccer star Cesc Fabregas wears his Beats Studio Wireless to block out distractions and get in the zone. Watch him find his focus as he prepares to dominate in the "Hear What You Want" director's cut.


Track: "The Man"
Artist: Aloe Blacc 
Album: Lift Your Spirit 


Beats would like to reiterate that the scenes in our new commercial starring Cesc Fabregas are purely fictional. The images in the commercial do not reflect real images. The views and thoughts of FC Barcelona or Real Madrid have not been involved or consulted in the making of this advert.

asset.author: Beats by Dre
